meanings.definition: The action of making something richer or more valuable.
meanings.sent1: The enrichments in the soil helped the plants grow stronger.
meanings.sent2: She added enrichments to her savings account to increase its value.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret enrichments to the recipe made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an enrichments to the community, making it a better place for all.
meanings.sent5: The enrichments of knowledge through reading books are invaluable.

meanings.definition: Things that improve or enhance the quality or value of something.
meanings.sent1: The new technology was an enrichments to the company's productivity.
meanings.sent2: Music and art are enrichments that bring joy to our lives.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected gift was an enrichments to her day, lifting her spirits.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is an enrichments that brightens even the darkest days.
meanings.sent5: The enrichments of friendship make life more meaningful.
